extendedInfo.description: Adobe AIR application enables you to have your favorite games and web apps with you all the time. AIR Runtime technology powers some of the best-selling and award-winning mobile apps and games on Google Play store. You can learn more about AIR at http://www.adobe.com/products/air.html. See what the most popular AIR apps are right now at http://gaming.adobe.com/showcase/.By clicking "Install", you agree to the Software License Agreement found at http://adobe.com/go/eum.

reviews.title: A magnificent mystery!
reviews.comment: This app has enabled me to travel the world first class, wine & dine in the finest restaurants, & date the world\'s most beautiful women......all this whilst not knowing what the #@*! this app does!!!
reviews.author: John Cozzi

reviews.title: Dangerous!
reviews.comment: This app killed my dog, gave my brother cancer, slept with my sister and left her in a family way... T\'aint right, ya hear me? T\'aint right! Imma get muh gun!
reviews.author: Rob Morris

reviews.title: Explains everything!
reviews.comment: First time I opened it the Grand Unified Field Theory flashed before my eyes and I can now manipulate space-time through the shear intellectual power it granted me. Please include omnipresence in the next update. Thankyou adobe.
reviews.author: Aiden Ziegelaar

reviews.title: Major bug...
reviews.comment: Since updating Adobe Air, laser beams, rainbows & unicorns flying out of the screen into my face has caused blindness, Please fix!
reviews.author: Harry Hard

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Since I\'ve downloaded adobe air, girls have notice me and I\'m having sex five times a day each with a different girl. Thanks adobe.
reviews.author: Paul Overton

reviews.title: Must Have!
reviews.comment: This app lets you watch dirty movies online without being monitored by your ISP while it has ability to make an immediate evil call when you got so horny! In addition this app also lets you talk directly with global terrorism network to trade a berral of diesel without being watched by NSA.
reviews.author: Khai Mrant

reviews.title: It\'ll open PDFs
reviews.comment: Yes, it will open PDFs but it will be more work than its worth to annotate them. I use FoxIt instead, especially because of the easy cloud integration.
reviews.author: Ashley S. MacKenzie

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Whatever it does I\'m sure it\'s working great and the latest update makes it that much better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t explain
reviews.comment: Omg what is this I have no clue what this does for me. My phone runs the same, it does everything it should do like normal. But if you want me to say it I will. This is the best in the world.
reviews.author: Ryan Bachman

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Im not exactly sure how this app works but after i installed it, i noticed my apps loaded faster, browsing and loading of images and videos are faster. Improved my phone\'s performance as well as get my other apps working. (Requires adobe air to run)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Walks my dog, plays my fav songs & whistles dixy but still won\'t do the dam dishes. WTF is this app 4 anyways :-\\
reviews.author: joanne nilsson

reviews.title: Wow!
reviews.comment: Thanks to this app, I was able to get the confidence to ask out the hottest girl in my school! She said yes! Thank you Adobe Air!
reviews.author: quincy chapman

reviews.title: WOW
reviews.comment: I was a little chump until this app came around. Now that I have adobe air. All the girls have been all over me. I\'m getting head like mad and even got a new place in rainy Seattle. Thanks Adobe Air, you don\'t do anything on my phone but thanks.
reviews.author: Mark Sanchez

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Thank you for fixing your app my phone doesnt freeze up anymore much appreciated
reviews.author: Sean Gubrud

reviews.title: PAY ATTENTION
reviews.comment: To get adobe flash,go to the adobe site and search flash player archives. Okay, scroll down and find a compatible version for what you have. I have a samsung galaxy note tablet.4.0  Tap to download, then check your notifications,tap install and youve got flash. If you are not allowing insallation of non market apps, then go into settings and in your security allow installation of non market apps before you go to adobe. Then you can change it back if you wish. Good luck! I was going crazy cause my tablet didnt come with flash. SEARCH ON THE MARKET   FP INSTALLER    IT WILL EXPLAIN IN EVEN BETTER DETAIL HOW TO GET IT. ;)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Outstanding!
reviews.comment: I don\'t always breathe air, but when I do... it\'s Adobe.
reviews.author: Randall Johnson

reviews.title: The bloat\'ll get yer goat
reviews.comment: Smaller updates please.  Or fewer oopses while coding. Ty.
reviews.author: Dirk Venter

reviews.title: Fully loaded
reviews.comment: I\'ve put on 20 pounds since I installed this app. It definitely packs the calories! I never thought air was so fattening
reviews.author: Erick Rhyne
